column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Missing the mark were the scallop empanada (the scallops were buried in all the bread
column2: while the seared scallops were much better)
column4: which was tough. The fingerling potatoes that came with it were good
column5: although that was $9 wasted for such a small
column6: disappointing dish. My cousin also ordered the citrus cured salmon
column7: and was disappointed because it was flattened and thin like paper. Thinner than even smoked salmon usually is
column8: and I think he was expecting a filet
column9: even if it was a tapas-sized one. Yet for our first try
